verses.verse: <S%G2258><s%> Now It Was <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Feast Of <S%G3588><s%> Unleavened Bread <S%G106><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Seeking <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Guile <S%G1388><s%> Getting Hold Of <S%G2902><s%> They Might Kill Him. <S%G615><s%>

They Said <S%G3004><s%>, But, <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feast, <S%G1859><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> A Tumult <S%G2351><s%> There Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Simon <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leper, <S%G3015><s%> <S%G2621><s%> As He Reclined At Table, <S%G846><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> An Alabaster Flask <S%G211><s%> Of Ointment <S%G3464><s%> Of Nard <S%G3487><s%> Pure <S%G4101><s%> Of Great Price; <S%G4185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Broken <S%G4937><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Alabaster Flask, <S%G211><s%> She Poured It <S%G2708><s%> His <S%G846><s%> On <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Head. <S%G2776><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And Were <S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Indignant <S%G23><s%> Within <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G684><s%> This Waste <S%G3778><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ointment <S%G3464><s%> Has Been Made? <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G1410><s%> For It Was Possible For <S%G1063><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To Have Been Sold <S%G4097><s%> For Above <S%G1883><s%> Three Hundred <S%G5145><s%> Denarii, <S%G1220><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Have Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Poor. <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Murmured <S%G1690><s%> At Her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Let Alone <S%G863><s%> Her; <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> Trouble <S%G2873><s%> Do Ye Cause? <S%G3930><s%> A Good <S%G2570><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> She Wrought <S%G2038><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Me. <S%G1691><s%>

<S%G3842><s%> For Always <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whenever <S%G3752><s%> Ye Desire <S%G2309><s%> Ye Are Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G846><s%> Them <S%G2095><s%> To Do Good; <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1691><s%> But Me <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Ye Have. <S%G2192><s%>

What <S%G3739><s%> Could <S%G2192><s%> She, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> She Did. <S%G4160><s%> She Came Beforehand <S%G4301><s%> <S%G3462><s%> To Anoint <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My Body <S%G4983><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Burial. <S%G1780><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Wheresoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Be Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2098><s%> This Glad Tidings <S%G5124><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Has Done <S%G4160><s%> This Woman <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Shall Be Spoken Of <S%G2980><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Memorial <S%G3422><s%> Of Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests, <S%G749><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Rejoiced, <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Promised <S%G1861><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> To Give. <S%G1325><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Sought <S%G2212><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Conveniently <S%G2122><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Might Deliver Up. <S%G3860><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Unleavened Bread, <S%G106><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> They Killed, <S%G2380><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Desirest Thou That <S%G2309><s%> Going <S%G565><s%> We Should Prepare <S%G2090><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Thou Mayest Eat <S%G5315><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover? <S%G3957><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Sends Forth <S%G649><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Meet <S%G528><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> A Pitcher <S%G2765><s%> Of Water <S%G5204><s%> Carrying; <S%G941><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Wherever <S%G1437><s%> He May Enter, <S%G1525><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3617><s%> Master Of The House, <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Guest Chamber <S%G2646><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> My Disciples <S%G3450><s%> I May Eat? <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Will Shew <S%G1166><s%> An Upper Room <S%G508><s%> Large, <S%G3173><s%> Furnished <S%G4766><s%> Ready. <S%G2092><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> For Us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Had Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Prepared <S%G2090><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover. <S%G3957><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> Being Come <S%G1096><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As Were Reclining At Table <S%G345><s%> They <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Eating <S%G2068><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Will Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Eating <S%G2068><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Be Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> ' By <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> One, <S%G3385><s%> Is It I? <S%G1473><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G243><s%> Another, <S%G3385><s%> Is It I? <S%G1473><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> It Is One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Dipping <S%G1686><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dish. <S%G5165><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Goes, <S%G5217><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3759><s%> But Woe <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> To That Man <S%G1565><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Is Delivered Up; <S%G3860><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Were It <S%G2258><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Had Not Been Born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> That Man. <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2068><s%> As They Were Eating, <S%G846><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> A Loaf, <S%G740><s%> Having Blessed <S%G2127><s%> He Brake, <S%G2806><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> Eat; <S%G5315><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> My Body. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cup, <S%G4221><s%> Having Given Thanks <S%G2168><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Drank <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> It <S%G846><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G129><s%> My Blood <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Covenant, <S%G1242><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Is Poured Out. <S%G1632><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3765><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not Any More In Any Wise <S%G3361><s%> Will I Drink <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G1081><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vine, <S%G288><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> That Day <S%G1565><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It <S%G846><s%> I Drink <S%G4095><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sung A Hymn <S%G5214><s%> They Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Ye Will Be Offended <S%G4624><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3571><s%>, This Night; <S%G3778><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> I Will Smite <S%G3960><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Be Scattered Abroad <S%G1287><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1453><s%> My Arising, <S%G3165><s%> I Will Go Before <S%G4254><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shall Be Offended, <S%G4624><s%> ' Yet <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I. <S%G1473><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3571><s%> This Night, <S%G3778><s%> Before <S%G4250><s%> That <S%G2228><s%> Twice The <S%G1364><s%> Cock <S%G220><s%> Crow, <S%G5455><s%> Thrice <S%G5151><s%> Thou Wilt Deny <S%G533><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But He <S%G1537><s%> Vehemently <S%G4053><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%>, The More, <S%G3123><s%> <S%G1437><s%> If <S%G3165><s%> It Were Needful For Me <S%G1163><s%> To Die With <S%G4880><s%> Thee, <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Will I Deny. <S%G533><s%> <S%G5615><s%> And In Like Manner <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> They Spake. <S%G3004><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Place <S%G5564><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name Is <S%G3686><s%> Gethsemane; <S%G1068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Sit <S%G2523><s%> Here, <S%G5602><s%> While <S%G2193><s%> I Shall Pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Takes <S%G3880><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> '' With <S%G3326><s%> Him; <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Be Greatly Amazed <S%G1568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Deeply Depressed. <S%G85><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Very Sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> My Soul <S%G3450><s%> Even To <S%G2193><s%> Death; <S%G2288><s%> Remain <S%G3306><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Watch. <S%G1127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Forward <S%G4281><s%> A Little <S%G3397><s%> He Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prayed <S%G4336><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> Might Pass <S%G3928><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour. <S%G5610><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said, <S%G3004><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> All Things Are <S%G3956><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> To Thee; <S%G4671><s%> Take Away <S%G3911><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> This; <S%G5124><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will, 2309 V-PAI-1S But 235 CONJ What 5101 I-ASN Thou. 4771 P-2NS

And <S%G2532><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Finds <S%G2147><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Sleeping. <S%G2518><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Sleepest Thou? <S%G2518><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Wast Thou Not Able <S%G2480><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> To Watch? <S%G1127><s%>
